summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5655 for the improvement of 24th Avenue West, from Gilman Avenue to Emerson Street, by constructing watermains; under Ordinance No. 74730, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
